cyberPilot.title: WindTre Business
cyberPilot.subtitle: Cyber Security Portal
cyberPilot.blurb1: Design a self-assessment matrix to present various cybersecurity solutions to clients based on system-identified needs
cyberPilot.blurb2: Design accessible reports for displaying collated cyber risk data in a personalised manner for presentation to decision makers at various levels of technical proficiency
cyberPilot.blurb3: Develop the interactive UI as a 'digital sales room' style environment for sales enablement
cyberPilot.blurb4: Design a UI that's recogniseable's as Windtre's, but diferent enough to be new and exciting

brembo.title: Brembo
brembo.subtitle: North America E-Commerce
brembo.blurb1: Benchmark the NA e-commerce website against competitors and partners to drive sales conversions
brembo.blurb2: Create and wireframed a sitemap to identify opportunities for improvement in the site's usability, and identify existing opportunities on the current e-commerce website
brembo.blurb3: Identify potential opportunities for sales, brand and target markets in future developments of the website
brembo.blurb4: Map customer personas and journeys across a variety of generations and target markets

areaClienti.title: WindTre Business
areaClienti.subtitle: Re-design Area Clienti
areaClienti.blurb1: Develop interactive user solutions and design a secure self service portal
areaClienti.blurb2: Research and implement user journeys and use cases
areaClienti.blurb3: Design logic systems for functional automations and develop a logic matrix for client support ticketing system
areaClienti.blurb4: Refactor and simplify the internal data structure

unifarco.title: Unifarco
unifarco.subtitle: Design System
unifarco.blurb1: Create a comprehensive, scalable, and detailed Design System
unifarco.blurb2: Use best practice methodologies to convert multiple design elements into standardised, reuseable design components
unifarco.blurb3: Map components into an easy to use design library in Figma for various stakeholders
unifarco.blurb4: Provide guideance, and mentorship, and feedback to junior designers throughout the project
